entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
